#summary Guide for the installation of the Xerela server.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

For now there's a Windows installer.  Instructions for installing on Mac and Linux will be coming soon.

= Prerequisites =

Server:
  * Java Development Kit (JDK) version 1.5 (aka Java 5) or higher <- You need the JDK, *not* just the JRE!
    ** download [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html JDK 6]
    ** download [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index-jdk5-jsp-142662.html JDK 5]
  * Perl 5.8 or higher - for Windows, [http://www.activestate.com/activeperl/downloads ActiveState Perl] is recommended: 

Client:
  * A browser with the [http://www.adobe.com/products/flashplayer/ Adobe Flash 9 Player]

= Windows Quickstart =

  * Download the [http://code.google.com/p/xerela/downloads/detail?name=XerelaServerSetup.2010-11-18v01.exe&can=2&q= latest installer]
  * Launch the installer and follow the instructions
  * Once the server is running, connect to it at https://servername:8080/
  * The default authentication credentials are admin/password
